Docs.summary: The classes that affect character-level text formatting in a way that triggers a text layout update when one is added or removed must implement this interface.

remarks.para: The classes that affect character-level text formatting in a way that triggers a text layout update when one is added or removed must implement this interface. This interface also includes UpdateAppearance since such a change implicitly also impacts the appearance.
